cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4035, Real Justice for Our Veterans Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 108 (Tuesday, June 22, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. JACKSON LEE:
H.R. 4035.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clauses 1 and 18 of the Constitution
of the United States.
[Page H3006]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

title: Real Justice for Our Veterans Act of 2021
